conbody.p: Dialog Nibelung includes two principal modules: teacher module and student module, together with some additional modules, some of which can be run as standalone programs: quiz module, configuration module, media player, student profiles manager etc. Teacher module should be installed on the teacher workstation and student module should be installed on each student workstation.
Teacher module ( ) controls the computer classroom, transmits audio and video materials, documents, and other files. It also implements other functionality of the language lab.
Student module ( ) works under control of the teacher module. It can also be used as a standalone audio player.
